channel.title: Any Ideas?
channel.description:
Ok I play this game called Maple Story i'm trying to make a private server I got access to their .WZ files which for them has all of their info on it such as background music, skills, items etc. I was wondering would there be any way that I could make a private server off of all of the information that they give in their .WZ files like I already got some of their map files saved onto my computer. Also I saved some of their info as a html file so that it tells me the X and Y cords of the Portals and it tells me the Hieght and the Width of the map and where all the objects are spawned at.
So my question is if I have all of this information how would I make a server?

item.title: Any Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

you can edit them with these programs: http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=active&q=how+do+you+edit+.dll+files

Read full topic

item.title: Any Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Ok i got most of the important files such as…
Music, Animations, Character looks, Skin color, Weapons, Hitting Animation, All clothes, All Sheilds, And I have all the information on where to put the Ropes, Portals, and etc.
I don’t know if I can get the server files but I’m gonna see if I can make it without the server files.

Questions :
Anyone know a program that I can edit .Dll files and or make .Dll files. Also does anyone know if there is a way to compile all the .Dll files together? Also is there a way that I can make it connect to a server ip so that I can get more then 1 person on it.

Anyone know a program that can open Wz files and paste all the info into a folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Any Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

A) You need to find out where all the important files are stored and what they do
B) You need to find out how to use these files
C) Put it all together.

Really, that’s all it takes…

Read full topic

item.title: Any Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

You are soo funny lol you cant even find it on google i’m trying to make one by myself I’ve been searching google can’t find anything but I got all of the items and character looks, items, npcs, all that stuff

And I know this kid in college that is going to college for computer programming and I think I can get him to help considering he used to play he got to lvl 120 then quit.

Read full topic
